attributes.action: PM should call for police to investigate all MPs who have used the expenses system for personal gain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No matter how the system is flawed, the fundamental rules of the expenses system are that they should only be claimed if the items are neccessary for doing the job. As we have seen clearly over the last week, this is not the case and many MPs appear to have used the system for no other reason than personal gain.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
